TEXT.English: You can check the parameters influencing your stability in the Financial Advisor
TEXT.French: Vous pouvez consulter les paramètres qui influencent votre stabilité dans l'écran du conseiller financier.
TEXT.German: Sie können die für Ihre Stabilität entscheidenden Parameter im Finanzberater überprüfen.
TEXT.Italian: Puoi controllare i parametri che influenzano la tua stabilità nella schermata del consigliere economico.
TEXT.Spanish: Puedes comprobar los parámetros que afectan a tu estabilidad en el consejero financiero.

TEXT.English: Discovering Microbiology will keep you safe from plagues
TEXT.French: Découvrir la microbiologie vous protègera de la peste.
TEXT.German: Die Erforschung der "Mikrobiologie" bewahrt Sie vor der Pest.
TEXT.Italian: Discovering Microbiology will keep you safe from plagues
TEXT.Spanish: Discovering Microbiology will keep you safe from plagues

TEXT.English: Not every lake produces 2 food. Some are salt lakes, and thus produce 1 food, like coast.
TEXT.French: Les lacs ne produisent pas tous 2 nourriture. Les lacs salés produisent seulement 1 nourriture, comme les côtes.
TEXT.German: Nicht jeder See produziert 2 Nahrung. Einige von ihnen sind Salzwasserseen, die aus diesem Grund wie Küsten-Geländefelder nur 1 Nahrung produzieren.
TEXT.Italian: Non tutti i laghi producono 2 cibo. Alcuni sono laghi salati, quindi producono 1 cibo, come la costa.
TEXT.Spanish: No todos los lagos producen 2 alimentos. Algunos son salados y, por tanto, producen 1 alimento, como las costas.

TEXT.English: If you get a skull over your cities, it means they have the plague! The population and units in the city and in the surrounding region will probably decrease dramatically. To reduce the effects and the duration of plague, keep your cities healthy.
TEXT.French: Si un crâne apparaît au-dessus d'une de vos villes, cela signifie qu'elle est frappée par la peste ! Attendez-vous alors à voir la population et les unités dans la ville et la région environnante diminuer considérablement. Pour réduire la durée et les effets de la peste, gardez vos villes en bonne santé.
TEXT.German: Wenn ein Totenkopf über Ihren Städten eingeblendet wird, bedeutet dies, dass dort die Pest ausgebrochen ist! Die Anzahl der Bevölkerung und Einheiten in der betreffenden Stadt und ihrer näheren Umgebung werden aller Voraussicht nach dramatisch sinken. Um die Auswirkungen und Dauer der Pest zu reduzieren, sollten Sie den Gesundheitswert Ihrer Städte möglichst hoch halten.
TEXT.Italian: Se vedi un teschio sulle tue città significa che c'è la peste! Popolazione e unità in città e nella zona circostante diminuiranno drasticamente. Per ridurre effetti e durata della peste mantieni in salute le tue città.
TEXT.Spanish: Si aparece una calavera sobre tus ciudades... ¡es por que tienen la peste! La población y las unidades de la ciudad y su región circundante probablemente comiencen a decrecer dramáticamente. Para reducir los efectos y la duración de la peste, mantén elevada la salud de tus ciudades.

TEXT.English: Plague can spread in many ways - through trade routes, along roads and between neighbouring cities.
TEXT.French: La peste peut se propager de nombreuses façons. Elle peut être apportée par les routes commerciales, les routes et les villes voisines.
TEXT.German: Die Pest kann sich auf viele Arten ausbreiten - über Handelswege, Straßen und zwischen benachbarten Städten.
TEXT.Italian: La peste si può diffondere in molti modi: attraverso rotte commerciali, lungo le strade e tra città confinanti.
TEXT.Spanish: La peste se puede propagar de muchas maneras, a través de las rutas comerciales, por los caminos o entre ciudades vecinas.

TEXT.English: The civilization you choose to play affects your difficulty every bit as much as the difficulty level you choose. Make sure to pick a civ that suits your playing style and your level of expertise.
TEXT.French: La difficulté du jeu dépend tout autant du niveau de difficulté sélectionné que de la civilisation avec laquelle vous jouez. Veillez à choisir une civilisation qui correspond à votre façon de jouer et à votre niveau d'expérience.
TEXT.German: Neben dem eingestellten Schwierigkeitsgrad wirkt sich auch die Wahl der Zivilisation auf das Schwierigkeitsniveau im Spiel aus. Achten Sie deshalb darauf, eine Zivilisation zu wählen, die Ihrem Spielstil und Ihrem Erfahrungsstand entspricht.
TEXT.Italian: La civiltà che scegli influenza la difficoltà tanto quanto il livello di difficoltà che hai scelto. Assicurati di selezionare una civiltà che sia adatta al tuo stile di gioco e al tuo livello di esperienza.
TEXT.Spanish: La civilización que elijas afecta a la dificultad tanto como el nivel de dificultad que elijas. Elige una civilización que se acomode a tu estilo de juego y tu nivel de experiencia.

TEXT.English: Every civ has hidden modifiers that influence their growth. This way, modern civs are not disadvantaged by their late start.
TEXT.French: Des modificateurs cachés influent sur le développement de chaque civilisation. Ainsi, les civilisations modernes ne sont pas désavantagées en commençant plus tard.
TEXT.German: Jede Zivilisation verfügt über verborgene Modifikatoren, die ihr Wachstum beeinflussen. Auf diese Weise werden auch moderne Zivilisationen trotz ihres späteren Spielstarts nicht benachteiligt.
TEXT.Italian: Ogni civiltà ha dei modificatori nascosti che ne influenzano la crescita. In questo modo le civiltà moderne non sono svantaggiate dall'avvio in ritardo.
TEXT.Spanish: Todas las civilizaciones tienen modificadores ocultos que afectan a su crecimiento. De este modo, el inicio tardío de las civilizaciones modernas no constituye una desventaja.

TEXT.English: You can declare war on independent states and minor civs only by moving your units into their territory.
TEXT.French: Vous ne pouvez déclarer la guerre aux états indépendants et aux petites civilisations qu'en envoyant des unités sur leur territoire.
TEXT.German: Sie können unabhängigen Staaten und unbedeutenderen Zivilisationen nur dadurch den Krieg erklären, dass Sie Ihre Einheiten in ihr Territorium einmarschieren lassen.
TEXT.Italian: Puoi dichiarare guerra agli stati indipendenti e alle civiltà minori solo facendo entrare le tue unità nel loro territorio.
TEXT.Spanish: Puedes declarar la guerra a estados independientes y civilizaciones menores si mueves tus unidades a su territorio.

TEXT.English: Combining certain civics will improve or harm the stability of your empire.
TEXT.French: La combinaison de certaines doctrines peut améliorer ou réduire la stabilité de votre empire.
TEXT.German: Die Kombination bestimmter Staatsformen kann die Stabilität Ihrer Zivilisation verbessern oder auch beeinträchtigen.
TEXT.Italian: Combinare alcune forme di governo può migliorare o peggiorare la stabilità del tuo impero.
TEXT.Spanish: Al combinar algunos principios mejorarás o perjudicarás la estabilidad de tu imperio.

TEXT.English: You can't see the current year until you discover calendar.
TEXT.French: Vous ne pouvez pas connaître l'année actuelle avant d'avoir découvert le calendrier.
TEXT.German: Das aktuelle Spieljahr ist bis zur Entdeckung des "Kalenders" nicht sichtbar.
TEXT.Italian: Non puoi sapere in che anno ti trovi fino a quando non scopri il calendario.
TEXT.Spanish: No podrás ver el año actual hasta que descubras el calendario.

TEXT.English: Remember that you can always take control of a newborn civ if you don't like the civilization you started with. You can also use this feature to play from 3000BC even when you want to pick a civ that starts later on.
TEXT.French: N'oubliez pas que vous pouvez toujours prendre le contrôle d'une civilisation émergente, si la civilisation avec laquelle vous avez commencé ne vous plaît pas. Vous pouvez aussi utiliser cette option pour jouer à partir de 3000 av. J.-C., même si vous voulez choisir une civilisation qui commence plus tard.
TEXT.German: Beachten Sie, dass Sie jederzeit eine neu entstandene Zivilisation übernehmen können, wenn Sie mit der Zivilisation, die Sie zuerst gewählt haben, nicht zufrieden sind. Sie können diese Möglichkeit auch nutzen, um bereits ab dem Jahr 3000 v. Chr. zu spielen, obwohl Sie sich eigentlich eine Zivilisation ausgesucht haben, die erst später im Spiel startet.
TEXT.Italian: Ricorda che puoi sempre assumere il controllo di una civiltà appena sorta, se non ti piace quella con cui hai iniziato. Inoltre puoi usare questa caratteristica per cominciare a giocare dal 3000 a.C. anche se vuoi scegliere una civiltà che comincia più tardi.
TEXT.Spanish: Recuerda que siempre puedes asumir el control de una civilización reciente si no te gusta la civilización con la que has empezado. También puedes aprovechar esta opción para jugar desde el año 3000 a. C. si deseas jugar con una civilización que empiece más tarde.

TEXT.English: Combining Totalitarianism and Constitution isn't a good idea.
TEXT.French: Il est déconseillé de donner une constitution à un État totalitaire.
TEXT.German: Die Kombination von Totalitarismus und Verfassung ist keine gute Idee.
TEXT.Italian: Combinare lo stato di polizia con la libertà di parola non è una buona idea.
TEXT.Spanish: Combinar Estado policial y Libertad de expresión no es una buena idea.

TEXT.English: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, vassals can declare war.
TEXT.French: Dans Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, les vassaux peuvent déclarer la guerre.
TEXT.German: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization können Vasallenstaaten Kriegserklärungen ausgeben.
TEXT.Italian: In Rhye's and Fall i vassalli possono dichiarare guerra.
TEXT.Spanish: Los vasallos pueden declarar una guerra en Rhye's and Fall of Civilization.

TEXT.English: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, movement through ocean tiles costs ½ a movement point.
TEXT.French: Dans Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, les déplacements sur les cases d'océan coûtent ½ point de mouvement.
TEXT.German: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization kostet die Fortbewegung auf Ozean-Geländefeldern ½ Fortbewegungspunkt.
TEXT.Italian: In Rhye's and Fall il movimento nelle caselle oceaniche costa ½ punto movimento.
TEXT.Spanish: En Rhye's and Fall of Civilization el movimiento a través de casillas de océano cuesta medio punto de movimiento.

TEXT.English: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, the max income from a shrine is 20 gold per turn.
TEXT.French: Dans Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, le revenu maximum d'un sanctuaire est de 20 pièces d'or par tour.
TEXT.German: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization beträgt das maximale Einkommen durch Schreine 20 Gold pro Runde.
TEXT.Italian: In Rhye's and Fall l'entrata massima da un santuario è di 20 oro per turno.
TEXT.Spanish: En Rhye's and Fall of Civilization los ingresos máximos de un santuario o corporación son de 20 monedas por turno.

TEXT.English: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, vassal states are enabled by the discovery of Contract.
TEXT.French: Dans Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, la découverte du contrat permet les États vassaux.
TEXT.German: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization werden Vasallenstaaten durch die Entdeckung des "Vertragswesens" verfügbar.
TEXT.Italian: In Rhye's and Fall gli stati vassalli sono abilitati dalla scoperta della monarchia.
TEXT.Spanish: En Rhye's and Fall of Civilization los estados vasallos se activan con el descubrimiento de la Monarquía.

TEXT.English: If you like the mod, and if you have any ideas to improve it, or you just have a bug to report, make sure to check out the development forum at CivFanatics.com.
TEXT.French: Si le mod vous plaît et que vous avez des idées pour l'améliorer, ou simplement un bug à signaler, pensez à consulter le forum de développement sur CivFanatics.com.
TEXT.German: Wenn Sie das Mod mögen und Verbesserungsvorschläge haben oder einen Bug melden wollen, besuchen Sie das Entwicklerforum unter CivFanatics.com.
TEXT.Italian: Se ti piace questo mod e hai delle idee per migliorarlo, o anche se devi semplicemente segnalare un problema, assicurati di controllare il forum di sviluppo su CivFanatics.com.
TEXT.Spanish: Si te gusta el mod y tienes ideas para mejorarlo o has encontrado algún error del que informar, visita el foro de diseño en CivFanatics.com.

TEXT.English: If it's been a while since the last time you got an updated version of the mod, make sure to check CivFanatics.com for a new version. The mod is in active development, and updates are uploaded often. Every update is full of fixes and new features.
TEXT.French: Si votre version du mod commence à dater, rendez-vous sur CivFanatics.com pour télécharger une version mise à jour. Le mod est en plein développement et bénéficie de mises à jour fréquentes. Chaque mise à jour apporte une multitude de corrections et de nouvelles options.
TEXT.German: Wenn es schon eine Weile her ist, seit Sie das letzte Mod-Update installiert haben, besuchen Sie CivFanatics.com, um eine neuere Version herunterzuladen. Bei diesem Mod handelt es sich um ein aktives Entwicklungsprojekt und dementsprechend häufig werden neue Updates bereitgestellt, von denen jedes zahlreiche Fixes und neue Features enthält.
TEXT.Italian: Se è passato un po' di tempo dall'ultima volta che hai scaricato una versione aggiornata del mod, assicurati di controllare su CivFanatics.com se ce n'è una nuova. Il mod è in continuo sviluppo e spesso vengono caricati degli aggiornamenti, ognuno dei quali è pieno di novità e risolve i problemi di quelli precedenti.
TEXT.Spanish: Si ya hace tiempo que conseguiste tu última versión actualizada del mod, visita CivFanatics.com para ver si hay alguna nueva. El mod está en continuo desarrollo, por lo que las actualizaciones son frecuentes. Todas las actualizaciones incluyen nuevas características y soluciones de errores.

TEXT.English: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, camera flying mode hotkey has changed to [CTRL + F]
TEXT.French: Dans Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, le raccourci pour activer la caméra libre est [CTRL + F].
TEXT.German: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization ist die Schnelltaste für den Kameraflugmodus [STRG + F]
TEXT.Italian: In Rhye's and Fall la combinazione di tasti per la selezione rapida della visuale dall'alto è diventata [CTRL + F]
TEXT.Spanish: En Rhye's and Fall of Civilization se ha cambiado el atajo de teclado para la cámara aérea a [CTRL + F].

TEXT.English: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, city founding is not allowed in tundra, ice or desert if far from water.
TEXT.French: Dans Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, il est impossible de fonder une ville sur une case de toundra, de désert ou de glace trop loin de l'eau.
TEXT.German: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization ist die Gründung einer Stadt auf den Geländearten Tundra, Eis und Wüste, sofern zu weit von einer Wasserquelle entfernt, nicht zulässig.
TEXT.Italian: In Rhye's and Fall non è permessa la fondazione di città nella tundra, sul ghiaccio o nel deserto, se distanti dall'acqua.
TEXT.Spanish: En Rhye's and Fall of Civilization no se permite fundar ciudades en tundra, hielo o desierto si no hay agua cerca.

TEXT.English: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, jungle, rainforest and marshes are impassable to most land units.
TEXT.French: Dans Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, la plupart des unités terrestres ne peuvent pas franchir les marais, les forêts tropicales et les jungles.
TEXT.German: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization sind Dschungel-, Regenwald- und Sumpf-Geländefelder für die meisten Landeinheiten unpassierbar.
TEXT.Italian: In Rhye's and Fall giungle e paludi sono impossibili da attraversare per la maggior parte delle unità terrestri.
TEXT.Spanish: En Rhye's and Fall of Civilization la mayoría de las unidades terrestres no pueden atravesar junglas ni ciénagas.

TEXT.English: If you attempt to stop the growth of newborn civs, some of your units will flip to their side.
TEXT.French: Si vous tentez d'arrêter le développement d'une civilisation émergente, certaines de vos unités se rangeront de son côté.
TEXT.German: Wenn Sie versuchen, das Wachstum neu entstandener Zivilisationen zu behindern, werden einige Ihrer Einheiten die Seiten wechseln.
TEXT.Italian: Se provi a fermare la crescita delle civiltà appena nate, alcune delle tue unità passeranno dalla loro parte.
TEXT.Spanish: Si intentas frenar el crecimiento de civilizaciones recientes, algunas de tus unidades se unirán a ellas.

TEXT.English: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, many wonder effects have been changed
TEXT.French: Dans Rhye's and Fall of Civilization, les effets de beaucoup de merveilles ont été modifiés.
TEXT.German: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization wurden die Auswirkungen vieler Wunder geändert.
TEXT.Italian: In Rhye's and Fall sono stati cambiati gli effetti di molte Grandi Meraviglie.
TEXT.Spanish: En Rhye's and Fall of Civilization se han cambiado los efectos de muchas maravillas.

TEXT.English: Never attack a city with only siege weapons. They may be the best way to damage a large number of enemy units, but once they inflict their maximum amount of damage, they will be unable to attack enemy units.
TEXT.French: N'attaquez jamais une ville uniquement avec des armes de siège. Il n'y a rien de mieux pour blesser un grand nombre d'unités ennemies, mais une fois qu'elles auront infligé leur maximum de dégâts, elles ne pourront plus attaquer les unités ennemies.
TEXT.German: Greifen Sie eine Stadt niemals ausschließlich mit Belagerungswaffen an! Sie mögen die beste Wahl sein, wenn es darum geht, einer großen Zahl feindlicher Einheiten Schaden zuzufügen, aber sobald sie ihren maximalen Schadenswert erreicht haben, können sie keine weiteren Angriffe mehr ausführen.
TEXT.Italian: Non attaccare mai una città solamente con unità d'assedio anche se possono essere il modo migliore per danneggiare molte unità nemiche ma, una volta inferto il massimo danno, non potranno più attaccare.
TEXT.Spanish: Nunca ataques una ciudad únicamente con armas de asedio. Puede que sean la mejor forma de dañar a un gran número de unidades enemigas, pero cuando hayan infligido su máxima cantidad de daño, no podrán atacar a las unidades enemigas.

TEXT.English: Good things come to spies who wait. Leaving a spy on a tile will reduce the costs of all Espionage Missions performed against objects in that tile. So leaving a Spy in an enemy city will make your Missions in that city significantly cheaper.
TEXT.French: Un espion patient est toujours récompensé. Si vous laissez un espion sur une case, cela réduira le coût de toutes les missions d'espionnage lancées contre les éléments dans cette case. Si vous laissez un espion dans une ville étrangère, vos missions dans cette ville vous coûteront donc bien moins cher.
TEXT.German: Gut Ding will Weile haben - das gilt auch für Spione. Wenn Sie einen Spion auf einem Geländefeld belassen, reduziert dies die Kosten für alle Spionagemissionen, die Sie gegen Objekte auf diesem Geländefeld ausführen. Dementsprechend werden Missionen, die Sie in einer feindlichen Stadt durchführen, ebenfalls erheblich preiswerter, wenn Sie Ihren Spion dort stationiert lassen.
TEXT.Italian: La spia migliore è quella che sa aspettare. Lasciando una spia su una casella riduce i costi di tutte le missioni di spionaggio verso quella casella. Perciò, lasciando una spia in una città nemica, le missioni verso di questa costeranno meno.
TEXT.Spanish: Los espías que saben esperar tienen sus ventajas. Dejar un espía en una casilla reducirá los costes de todas las misiones de espionaje realizadas contra los objetos de dicha casilla. Por tanto, dejar un espía en una ciudad enemiga abaratará significativamente el coste de tus misiones en dicha ciudad.

TEXT.English: If you spend more Espionage Points than an opponent, then your missions towards that opponent will be cheaper. Every point you spend throughout the game is added towards this total, so if you see a fierce rival outspending you in Espionage Points, it would be wise to increase your Espionage spending.
TEXT.French: Si vous dépensez plus de points d'espionnage qu'un de vos adversaires, vos missions contre lui vous coûteront moins cher. Chaque point dépensé dans le jeu est totalisé, alors si vous avez un rival acharné qui dépense plus de points d'espionnage que vous, vous avez intérêt à augmenter vos dépenses d'espionnage.
TEXT.German: Wenn Sie mehr Spionagepunkte als eine gegnerische Zivilisation einsetzen, sinken die Kosten für die Durchführung Ihrer Missionen gegen diese Nation. Jeder Punkt, den Sie im Laufe des Spiels einsetzen, wird in der Gesamtsumme addiert. Wenn Sie also feststellen, dass ein erbitterter Rivale mehr Spionagepunkte investiert als Sie selbst, wäre es klug, Ihre eigenen Spionageinvestitionen zu erhöhen.
TEXT.Italian: Se spendi un maggior numero di punti spionaggio di un avversario, le tue missioni nei suoi confronti diventeranno più economiche. Ogni punto che spendi durante la partita viene aggiunto a questo totale, perciò se vedi un avversario che ti surclassa in punti spionaggio, è una mossa saggia aumentare la spesa in questo senso.
TEXT.Spanish: Si gastas más puntos de espionaje que un rival, tus misiones contra dicho adversario serán más baratas. Cada punto que gastes a lo largo de la partida se suma a este total, de modo que si ves que un duro rival gasta más que tú en puntos de espionaje, es buena idea aumentar tu gasto en espionaje.

TEXT.English: When on the defense, be sure to set your Fighters and Jet Fighters to the "Intercept" mission when they're not running missions. They will defend the skies from opposing Air Units, earning them valuable experience points.
TEXT.French: Quand vous vous défendez, pensez à confier une mission d'interception à vos chasseurs et vos chasseurs à réaction, si vous n'avez aucune autre mission à leur confier. Ils chasseront les unités aériennes ennemies dans le ciel et gagneront de précieux points d'expérience.
TEXT.German: Im Verteidigungsfall sollten Sie Ihre Jäger und Düsenjäger anweisen, Abfangmissionen durchzuführen, sofern keine anderen Missionen anstehen. Daraufhin werden sie den Luftraum gegen feindliche Lufteinheiten verteidigen und auf diese Weise gleichzeitig wertvolle Erfahrungspunkte sammeln.
TEXT.Italian: Quando difendi, assicurati che i tuoi caccia e jet da combattimento siano impostati su "Intercetta" quando non hanno altre missioni assegnate. Così facendo, difenderanno i cieli dalle unità aeree rivali, conquistando dei punti esperienza importanti.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando estés defendiendo y tus Cazas y Cazas a reacción no estén cumpliendo otras misiones, asegúrate de que tengan activada la misión "Interceptar". Así defenderán los cielos de unidades aéreas rivales, lo cual les reportará unos valiosos puntos de experiencia.

TEXT.English: During wartime, your ships may sever all naval trade routes entering an enemy city by using the "Blockade" Mission within range of the opposing metropolis. Using a Privateer to blockade a city during peace time will even allow you to plunder gold from your enemy's treasury!
TEXT.French: En temps de guerre, vos navires peuvent couper toutes les routes commerciales maritimes rejoignant une ville ennemie, en exécutant la mission Blocus près de la métropole adverse. Utiliser des Corsaires pour bloquer une ville en tant de paix vous permet même de piller l'or du trésor ennemi !
TEXT.German: Zu Kriegszeiten können Ihre Schiffe alle Marinehandelswege zu einer gegnerischen Stadt mittels der Blockade-Mission innerhalb der Reichweite der gegnerischen Stadt blockieren. Wenn Sie eine Stadt zu Friedenszeiten mit Freibeutern blockieren, können Sie sogar Gold aus der Schatzkammer des Gegners plündern!
TEXT.Italian: In tempo di guerra, le tue navi possono bloccare tutte le rotte commerciali navali dirette verso una città nemica compiendo la missione "Embargo" nel raggio della città. Effettuando l'embargo con una nave corsara in tempo di pace potrai sottrarre oro al tesoro nemico!
TEXT.Spanish: En tiempos de guerra, tus barcos pueden cortar todas las rutas comerciales que pasen por una ciudad enemiga si usan la misión "Bloqueo" dentro del alcance de la metrópolis contraria. Usar un corsario para bloquear una ciudad en tiempos de paz te permitirá incluso saquear oro de la tesorería de tu enemigo.

TEXT.English: Intercontinental trade routes now yield more gold than normal trade routes. Build a Customs House to further cash in.
TEXT.French: Les routes commerciales intercontinentales rapportent désormais plus d'or que les routes commerciales normales. Construisez un poste de douane pour augmenter encore vos recettes.
TEXT.German: Interkontinentale Handelswege erwirtschaften nun mehr Gold als normale Handelswege. Errichten Sie für zusätzliche Einnahmen ein Zollamt.
TEXT.Italian: Le rotte commerciali intercontinentali ora producono più oro di quelle normali. Costruisci delle dogane per aumentare gli introiti.
TEXT.Spanish: Ahora, las rutas comerciales intercontinentales reportan más oro que las rutas comerciales normales. Construye una aduana para aumentar los ingresos obtenidos.

TEXT.English: Naval Units performing "Blockade" Missions prevent all enemy trade from passing within their blockading range. Making sure an enemy city is within that range is a sure-fire way to stop enemy trade routes.
TEXT.French: Les unités navales faisant la mission Blocus empêchent tout le commerce ennemi de passer dans la portée du blocus. S'assurer que la ville ennemie est à portée est un moyen sûr de bloquer les routes commerciales ennemies.
TEXT.German: Marineeinheiten, die die Blockade-Mission durchführen, verhindern den gesamten gegnerischen Handel innerhalb der Blockadereichweite. Die Errichtung einer Blockade in Reichweite einer gegnerischen Stadt ist eine zuverlässige Methode, gegnerischen Handel zu verhindern.
TEXT.Italian: Le unità navali che compiono la missione "Embargo" impediscono a tutto il commercio nemico di attraversare l'area bloccata. Assicurati che nel raggio d'azione ricada una città nemica per bloccare le rotte commerciali del nemico.
TEXT.Spanish: Las unidades navales que lleven a cabo la misión "Bloqueo" evitan que todo el comercio enemigo pase por el alcance de su bloqueo. Asegurarse de que una ciudad enemiga esté dentro de ese alcance es un disparo certero para conseguir detener las rutas comerciales enemigas.

TEXT.English: The game is won when a Spaceship arrives on Alpha Centauri, not when it is launched. The more Engines and Thrusters you build, the faster the Spaceship will arrive.
TEXT.French: Pour gagner la partie, il faut que votre vaisseau spatial soit le premier à atteindre Alpha du Centaure. Il ne vous suffit pas de le faire décoller en premier. Plus vous construirez de moteurs et de propulseurs, plus votre vaisseau arrivera vite.
TEXT.German: Dieses Spiel gilt mit der Ankunft eines Raumschiffs auf Alpha Centauri als gewonnen und nicht mit dem Start des Raumschiffs. Je mehr Motoren und Triebwerke Sie bauen, desto schneller wird das Raumschiff ankommen.
TEXT.Italian: Si vince una partita quando l'astronave raggiunge Alpha Centauri e non quando viene lanciata. Più motori e propulsori costruisci, più rapidamente l'astronave arriverà a destinazione.
TEXT.Spanish: La partida se gana cuando una nave espacial llega a Alpha Centauri, no cuando ésta se lanza. Cuantos más motores y propulsores construyas, más rápido llegará la nave espacial.

TEXT.English: Your Fighters can intercept multiple enemy planes per turn, but become less effective at it as they get damage, so take care to repair your defensive planes.
TEXT.French: Vos chasseurs peuvent intercepter plusieurs avions ennemis par tour, mais sont moins efficaces quand ils sont endommagés. Pensez donc bien à réparer vos avions de défense.
TEXT.German: Ihre Jäger können in jeder Runde mehrere feindliche Lufteinheiten abfangen, Ihre Schlagkraft sinkt allerdings, wenn sie beschädigt werden. Sie sollten Ihre defensiven Lufteinheiten daher stets reparieren.
TEXT.Italian: I tuoi caccia possono intercettare più aerei per turno, ma diventano meno efficaci se subiscono danni, perciò premurati di riparare i tuoi velivoli difensivi.
TEXT.Spanish: Tus cazas pueden interceptar varios aviones por turno, pero se vuelven menos eficaces a medida que sufren daños, por lo que debes preocuparte de reparar tus aviones defensivos.

TEXT.English: Use the Submarine's stealth along with its ability to carry conventional and tactical nuclear missiles to launch a devastating opening attack on another landmass.
TEXT.French: Tirez parti de la furtivité du sous-marin et de sa capacité à transporter des missiles conventionnels et des missiles nucléaires pour lancer une attaque dévastatrice contre un autre continent.
TEXT.German: Nutzen Sie die Tarnung Ihrer U-Boote und ihre Fähigkeit, konventionelle und taktische Atomraketen zu befördern, um vernichtende Startoffensiven auf gegnerische Landmassen auszuführen.
TEXT.Italian: Usa l'invisibilità del sottomarino oltre all'abilità di trasportare missili tattici e nucleari per lanciarli e scatenare l'inferno sulla terraferma.
TEXT.Spanish: Utiliza la invisibilidad ante el radar del submarino junto a su capacidad para transportar misiles nucleares convencionales y tácticos para lanzar un devastador ataque inicial sobre otra masa de tierra.

TEXT.English: Keep some spies in your borders for counter-espionage. Enemy spies can wreak havoc!
TEXT.French: Gardez quelques espions à l'intérieur de vos frontières pour le contre-espionnage. Les espions ennemis peuvent faire des ravages !
TEXT.German: Behalten Sie zum Zweck der Gegenspionage einige Spione innerhalb Ihrer Grenzen. Feindliche Spione können verheerende Schäden anrichten!
TEXT.Italian: Tieni alcune spie all'interno dei tuoi confini per effettuare il controspionaggio. Le spie nemiche possono scatenare il caos!
TEXT.Spanish: Mantén algunos espías en tus fronteras para practicar el contraespionaje. ¡Los espías enemigos pueden sembrar el caos!

TEXT.English: Short on gold? Send your spies to steal from your neighbors!
TEXT.French: Vous manquez d'or ? Envoyez vos espions en voler à vos voisins !
TEXT.German: Knapp bei Kasse? Dann senden Sie Ihre Spione aus, um die benachbarten Zivilisationen zu bestehlen!
TEXT.Italian: Hai pochi soldi? Le tue spie possono rubare oro ai tuoi vicini!
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Andas escaso de oro? ¡Envía a tus espías a robar a tus vecinos!

TEXT.English: Mounted units cause flanking damage to certain Siege weapons. For example, all Cannons in an enemy stack are damaged if an attacking Cavalry unit survives the battle!
TEXT.French: Les unités montées infligent des dégâts d'attaque de flanc à certaines armes de siège. Tous les canons d'un groupe ennemi seront endommagés, par exemple, si une unité de cavalerie les attaque et survit à la bataille !
TEXT.German: Berittene Einheiten verursachen Flankenschäden an bestimmten Belagerungseinheiten. Zum Beispiel werden alle in einem Verband organisierten feindlichen Kanonen beschädigt, wenn eine angreifende Kavallerieeinheit das Gefecht überlebt!
TEXT.Italian: Le unità montate possono causare danno laterale contro alcune unità d'assedio. Per esempio, tutti i cannoni raggruppati vengono danneggiati se la cavalleria che effettua l'attacco sopravvive alla battaglia!
TEXT.Spanish: Las unidades montadas causan daño de flanqueo a ciertas armas de asedio. Por ejemplo, ¡todos los cañones de un apilamiento enemigo quedarán dañados si una unidad de caballería atacante sobrevive a la batalla!

TEXT.English: Random events are tied to what is happening within your civilization. If you want to experience all of the events that are possible, you will have to play numerous games using different approaches and strategies: war and peace, different religious approaches, different technological paths, different civics and more!
TEXT.French: Les événements aléatoires sont liés à la manière dont vous gérez votre civilisation. Si vous voulez expérimenter tous les événements possibles, vous allez devoir jouer un nombre impressionnant de parties en variant sans cesse vos stratégies : préférer la guerre ou la paix, changer d'approche en matière de religion, de technologie ou de doctrine, etc. Il n'y a pas de limite !
TEXT.German: Zufallsereignisse hängen davon ab, was innerhalb Ihrer Zivilisation geschieht. Wenn Sie alle möglichen Ereignisse erleben wollen, müssen Sie zahlreiche Spiele mit unterschiedlichen Ansätzen und Strategien spielen: Krieg und Frieden, unterschiedliche religiöse Ansätze, Technologiewege, Staatsformen und vieles mehr!
TEXT.Italian: Gli eventi casuali sono collegati a quel che accade all'interno della tua civiltà. Se vuoi sperimentare tutti gli eventi possibili, dovrai giocare diverse partite utilizzando vari approcci e strategie: guerra e pace, religioni e sviluppi tecnologici diversi, e persino cambiare le forme di governo!
TEXT.Spanish: Los acontecimientos al azar están ligados a lo que ocurra en tu civilización. Si quieres probar todos los sucesos posibles, tendrás que jugar numerosas partidas con diferentes aproximaciones y estrategias: guerra y paz, distintas propuestas religiosas, diferentes caminos tecnológicos, principios diversos y demás.

TEXT.English: You may be wise to keep some reserve gold in your treasury. You never know when your savings may help mitigate the effects of a disastrous event or grant you access to additional opportunities when a positive event rolls around.
TEXT.French: Faites en sorte de ne pas dilapider votre trésor. Vos économies pourraient un jour vous aider à atténuer les effets d'un évènement catastrophique ou vous donner accès à de nouvelles opportunités si un évènement positif devait survenir.
TEXT.German: Es wäre klug, ein paar Goldreserven in der Schatzkammer zu belassen. Man weiß nie, wann das Ersparte dabei helfen könnte, die Auswirkungen eines verheerenden Ereignisses zu mildern, oder Ihnen zusätzliche Möglichkeiten bei einem positiven Ereignis verschafft.
TEXT.Italian: Potrebbe essere saggio tenere una riserva d'oro nel tuo tesoro. Non si può mai sapere quando potrebbe rendersi necessario mitigare gli effetti di un evento catastrofico, o quando una serie positiva di eventi potrebbe permetterti di accedere ad altre opportunità.
TEXT.Spanish: Debes ser prudente y guardar algunas reservas de oro en tu tesoro. Nunca se sabe cuándo tus ahorros pueden servir para mitigar los efectos de un suceso desastroso o para darte acceso a oportunidades adicionales cuando se produzca un suceso positivo.

TEXT.English: A negative event that afflicts one of your rivals is, in effect, like a positive event for you! Keep an eye on the world news reports in case an event happening to other nations opens new opportunities for you.
TEXT.French: Les événements négatifs qui frappent vos rivaux peuvent s'avérer extrêmement positifs pour vous ! Gardez un oeil sur les informations en provenance des autres pays, au cas où un événement vous offrirait de nouvelles opportunités.
TEXT.German: Ein negatives Ereignis, das einen Ihrer Gegner betrifft, ist ein positives Ereignis für Sie! Achten Sie auf die Berichte in den Weltnachrichten, damit Sie von den Ereignissen in anderen Nationen erfahren, die Ihnen selbst neue Möglichkeiten eröffnen.
TEXT.Italian: Un evento negativo che colpisce un tuo avversario è a tutti gli effetti un evento positivo per te! Tieni d'occhio le notizie dal mondo: eventi che si verificano in altre nazioni potrebbero aprirti nuove opportunità.
TEXT.Spanish: Los sucesos negativos que aflijan a tus rivales son, de hecho, buenas noticias para ti. Estate atento a las noticias internacionales por si algo que ha ocurrido en otras naciones abriera nuevas oportunidades para ti.

TEXT.English: Rival civilizations led by computer opponents now pose a more significant threat from the sea. Stronger fleets, amphibious invasions... Don't be caught unprepared! The more warlike leaders can be very sneaky with their attack plans, as they have learned to think beyond the sword.
TEXT.French: Les civilisations rivales menées par l'ordinateur sont désormais plus promptes à vous attaquer par la mer. Flottes plus puissantes, invasions amphibies... Ne vous laissez pas surprendre ! Les dirigeants les plus sanguinaires peuvent s'avérer très sournois maintenant que le mot "stratégie" ne leur est plus inconnu.
TEXT.German: Von Computergegnern geführte gegnerische Zivilisationen stellen nun eine große Bedrohung vom Meer aus dar. Stärkere Flotten, amphibische Angriffe ... Lassen Sie sich nicht überrumpeln! Kriegerische Zivilisationen können in Bezug auf ihre Angriffspläne sehr raffiniert vorgehen, da sie gelernt haben, über den Rand der Klinge hinauszusehen.
TEXT.Italian: Le civiltà rivali controllate dal computer costituiscono una minaccia più consistente dal mare: flotte più forti, invasioni anfibie... Non farti cogliere di sorpresa! I leader più bellicosi possono sviluppare piani di attacchi molto subdoli, perché hanno imparato tattiche diverse dai normali attacchi armati.
TEXT.Spanish: Las civilizaciones rivales que lleva el ordenador plantean una amenaza mucho más seria desde el mar. Mayores flotas, invasiones anfibias... ¡Que no te pillen desprevenido! Los lâderes más belicosos pueden ser mucho más viles con sus planes de ataque, ya que han aprendido a pensar más allá de la espada.

TEXT.English: AI Mongols receive additional armies to attack Russia and the Middle East. Be prepared!
TEXT.French: Lorsqu'ils sont contrôlés par l'IA, les Mongols reçoivent des armées supplémentaires pour attaquer la Russie et le Moyen-Orient. Soyez prêt !
TEXT.German: AI Mongols receive additional armies to attack Russia and the Middle East. Be prepared!
TEXT.Italian: AI Mongols receive additional armies to attack Russia and the Middle East. Be prepared!
TEXT.Spanish: AI Mongols receive additional armies to attack Russia and the Middle East. Be prepared!

TEXT.English: In Dawn of Civilization, several civilizations like Byzantium, Italy and Thailand have conditional spawns, and don't appear in every game.
TEXT.French: Dans Dawn of Civilizations, plusieurs civilisations, comme Byzance, l'Italie et la Thaïlande, naissent seulement lorsque certaines conditions sont remplies. Elles n'apparaissent donc pas dans toutes les parties.
TEXT.German: In Dawn of Civilization, several civilizations like Byzantium, Italy and Thailand have conditional spawns, and don't appear in every game.
TEXT.Italian: In Dawn of Civilization, several civilizations like Byzantium, Italy and Thailand have conditional spawns, and don't appear in every game.
TEXT.Spanish: In Dawn of Civilization, several civilizations like Byzantium, Italy and Thailand have conditional spawns, and don't appear in every game.

TEXT.English: Several AI civilizations flip larger areas on spawn to help them along.
TEXT.French: Plusieurs civilisations contrôlées par l'IA reçoivent un plus grand territoire à leur naissance afin de les aider.
TEXT.German: Several AI civilizations flip larger areas on spawn to help them along.
TEXT.Italian: Several AI civilizations flip larger areas on spawn to help them along.
TEXT.Spanish: Several AI civilizations flip larger areas on spawn to help them along.

TEXT.English: In Dawn of Civilization, free technology effects like the Oracle only allow you to choose technologies of your current or earlier eras.
TEXT.French: Dans Dawn of Civilization, les technologies gratuites, comme celle que donne l'Oracle, doivent être choisies parmi celles de l'ère actuelle ou des ères passées.
TEXT.German: In Dawn of Civilization, free technology effects like the Oracle only allow you to choose technologies of your current or earlier eras.
TEXT.Italian: In Dawn of Civilization, free technology effects like the Oracle only allow you to choose technologies of your current or earlier eras.
TEXT.Spanish: In Dawn of Civilization, free technology effects like the Oracle only allow you to choose technologies of your current or earlier eras.

TEXT.English: If you're playing as a Western European civilization, build a Trading Company to expand to Africa or Asia.
TEXT.French: Si vous contrôlez une civilisation d'Europe de l'Ouest, la construction d'une compagnie commerciale vous permettra de prendre de l'expansion en Afrique ou en Asie.
TEXT.German: If you're playing as a Western European civilization, build a Trading Company to expand to Africa or Asia.
TEXT.Italian: If you're playing as a Western European civilization, build a Trading Company to expand to Africa or Asia.
TEXT.Spanish: If you're playing as a Western European civilization, build a Trading Company to expand to Africa or Asia.

TEXT.English: Pagan Temples cannot be built in cities that have a religion, and when a religion spreads to a city with a Pagan Temple, it is replaced by that religion's temple instead.
TEXT.French: Les temples païens ne peuvent être construits dans les villes adeptes d'une religion. Lorsqu'une religion se propage dans une ville possédant un temple païen, ce dernier est remplacé par un lieu de culte de la religion.
TEXT.German: Pagan Temples cannot be built in cities that have a religion, and when a religion spreads to a city with a Pagan Temple, it is replaced by that religion's temple instead.
TEXT.Italian: Pagan Temples cannot be built in cities that have a religion, and when a religion spreads to a city with a Pagan Temple, it is replaced by that religion's temple instead.
TEXT.Spanish: Pagan Temples cannot be built in cities that have a religion, and when a religion spreads to a city with a Pagan Temple, it is replaced by that religion's temple instead.

TEXT.English: In Dawn of Civilization, civilisations can respawn in historically appropriate time periods, even before Nationalism has been discovered.
TEXT.French: Dans Dawn of Civilization, les civilisations peuvent réapparaître pendant les périodes appropriées, et ce, même avant la découverte du nationalisme.
TEXT.German: In Dawn of Civilization, civilisations can respawn in historically appropriate time periods, even before Nationalism has been discovered.
TEXT.Italian: In Dawn of Civilization, civilisations can respawn in historically appropriate time periods, even before Nationalism has been discovered.
TEXT.Spanish: In Dawn of Civilization, civilisations can respawn in historically appropriate time periods, even before Nationalism has been discovered.

TEXT.English: You need to discover Exploration before you can vassalize far away civilizations.
TEXT.French: Vous devez découvrir l'exploration pour pouvoir vassaliser les civilisations lointaines.
TEXT.German: You need to discover Exploration before you can vassalize far away civilizations.
TEXT.Italian: You need to discover Exploration before you can vassalize far away civilizations.
TEXT.Spanish: You need to discover Exploration before you can vassalize far away civilizations.

TEXT.English: You need to discover Exploration before you can train settlers on other continents than your capital's.
TEXT.French: Vous devez découvrir l'explorarion pour pouvoir créer des colons sur des continents autres que celui où est située votre capitale.
TEXT.German: You need to discover Exploration before you can train settlers on other continents than your capital's.
TEXT.Italian: You need to discover Exploration before you can train settlers on other continents than your capital's.
TEXT.Spanish: You need to discover Exploration before you can train settlers on other continents than your capital's.

TEXT.English: In Dawn of Civilization, military units cannot be killed by the plague, only weakened.
TEXT.French: Dans Dawn of Civilization, la peste affaiblit les unités militaires mais ne les tue pas.
TEXT.German: In Dawn of Civilization, military units cannot be killed by the plague, only weakened.
TEXT.Italian: In Dawn of Civilization, military units cannot be killed by the plague, only weakened.
TEXT.Spanish: In Dawn of Civilization, military units cannot be killed by the plague, only weakened.

TEXT.English: Related religions like Hinduism and Buddhism or Confucianism and Taoism don't create unhappiness if one of them is your state religion
TEXT.French: Les religions apparentées, comme l'hindouisme et le bouddhisme ou encore le confucianisme et le taoïsme, ne créent pas de malheur si l'une d'elles est votre religion d'État.
TEXT.German: Related religions like Hinduism and Buddhism or Confucianism and Taoism don't create unhappiness if one of them is your state religion
TEXT.Italian: Related religions like Hinduism and Buddhism or Confucianism and Taoism don't create unhappiness if one of them is your state religion
TEXT.Spanish: Related religions like Hinduism and Buddhism or Confucianism and Taoism don't create unhappiness if one of them is your state religion

TEXT.English: Related religions like Hinduism and Buddhism or Confucianism and Taoism create reduced diplomacy penalties
TEXT.French: Les religions apparentées, comme l'hindouisme et le bouddhisme ou encore le confucianisme et le taoïsme, créent des pénalités diplomatiques moindres.
TEXT.German: Related religions like Hinduism and Buddhism or Confucianism and Taoism create reduced diplomacy penalties
TEXT.Italian: Related religions like Hinduism and Buddhism or Confucianism and Taoism create reduced diplomacy penalties
TEXT.Spanish: Related religions like Hinduism and Buddhism or Confucianism and Taoism create reduced diplomacy penalties

TEXT.English: Corporation headquarters and executives have been removed, corporations spread on their own if the prerequisites are met.
TEXT.French: Les sièges sociaux des sociétés commerciales ont été retirés du jeu ; les sociétés commerciales se propagent par elles-mêmes lorsque les conditions sont réunies.
TEXT.German: Corporation headquarters and executives have been removed, corporations spread on their own if the prerequisites are met.
TEXT.Italian: Corporation headquarters and executives have been removed, corporations spread on their own if the prerequisites are met.
TEXT.Spanish: Corporation headquarters and executives have been removed, corporations spread on their own if the prerequisites are met.

TEXT.English: The Silk Route and Trading Company corporations can only spread in historically appropriate regions.
TEXT.French: Les sociétés commerciales de la route de la soie et de la compagnie commerciale ne peuvent se propager que dans les régions appropriées d'un point de vue historique.
TEXT.German: The Silk Route and Trading Company corporations can only spread in historically appropriate regions.
TEXT.Italian: The Silk Route and Trading Company corporations can only spread in historically appropriate regions.
TEXT.Spanish: The Silk Route and Trading Company corporations can only spread in historically appropriate regions.

TEXT.English: To attract a corporation, acquire more of its resources, build associated buildings, or adopt the Free Enterprise civic.
TEXT.French: Pour attirer une société commerciale, obtenez davantage de ressources reliées, construisez les bâtiments associés, ou adoptez la doctrine de la libre entreprise.
TEXT.German: To attract a corporation, acquire more of its resources, build associated buildings, or adopt the Free Enterprise civic.
TEXT.Italian: To attract a corporation, acquire more of its resources, build associated buildings, or adopt the Free Enterprise civic.
TEXT.Spanish: To attract a corporation, acquire more of its resources, build associated buildings, or adopt the Free Enterprise civic.

TEXT.English: In Dawn of Civilization, many wonders have religion or civic prerequisites to encourage their historical distribution.
TEXT.French: Dans Dawn of Civilization, de nombreuses merveilles nécessitent des religions ou des doctrines spécifiques afin d'encourager leur construction dans les régions appropriées.
TEXT.German: In Dawn of Civilization, many wonders have religion or civic prerequisites to encourage their historical distribution.
TEXT.Italian: In Dawn of Civilization, many wonders have religion or civic prerequisites to encourage their historical distribution.
TEXT.Spanish: In Dawn of Civilization, many wonders have religion or civic prerequisites to encourage their historical distribution.

TEXT.English: Researching Academia as a Catholic civilization starts the Reformation, prompting all Catholic civilizations to decide if they want to convert to Protestantism.
TEXT.French: La première civilisation catholique à découvrir l'université déclenche la Réforme. Toutes les civilisations catholiques doivent alors décider si elles se convertissent au protestantisme.
TEXT.German: Researching Academia as a Catholic civilization starts the Reformation, prompting all Catholic civilizations to decide if they want to convert to Protestantism.
TEXT.Italian: Researching Academia as a Catholic civilization starts the Reformation, prompting all Catholic civilizations to decide if they want to convert to Protestantism.
TEXT.Spanish: Researching Academia as a Catholic civilization starts the Reformation, prompting all Catholic civilizations to decide if they want to convert to Protestantism.

TEXT.English: In Dawn of Civilization, vassals do not have to give up tile control to their masters in the first ring around their cities.
TEXT.French: Dans Dawn of Civilization, les vassaux ne cèdent pas à leur maître le contrôle des cases adjacentes à leurs villes.
TEXT.German: In Dawn of Civilization, vassals do not have to give up tile control to their masters in the first ring around their cities.
TEXT.Italian: In Dawn of Civilization, vassals do not have to give up tile control to their masters in the first ring around their cities.
TEXT.Spanish: In Dawn of Civilization, vassals do not have to give up tile control to their masters in the first ring around their cities.

TEXT.English: When a UHV goal asks to control a civilization, you need to own more cities in their core than they do.
TEXT.French: Quand un objectif de VHU nécessite de contrôler une civilisation, il faut posséder plus de villes dans leur cœur historique qu'eux.
TEXT.German: When a UHV goal asks to control a civilization, you need to own more cities in their core than they do.
TEXT.Italian: When a UHV goal asks to control a civilization, you need to own more cities in their core than they do.
TEXT.Spanish: When a UHV goal asks to control a civilization, you need to own more cities in their core than they do.

TEXT.English: Areas that are relevant to your UHV are displayed in light blue in the tile tooltip.
TEXT.French: Les régions pertinentes pour votre VHU apparaissent en bleu pâle dans l'information de chaque case.
TEXT.German: Areas that are relevant to your UHV are displayed in light blue in the tile tooltip.
TEXT.Italian: Areas that are relevant to your UHV are displayed in light blue in the tile tooltip.
TEXT.Spanish: Areas that are relevant to your UHV are displayed in light blue in the tile tooltip.

TEXT.English: Dawn of Civilization is still actively developed. You can get the latest bugfixes and additions by using the Git version of the mod. Visit the forum under http://forums.civfanatics.com/forumdisplay.php?f=452 to find out how.
TEXT.French: Dawn of Civilization est encore en développement. Vous pouvez obtenir les dernières mises à jour grâce à la version Git du mod. Visitez le forum à l'adresse http://forums.civfanatics.com/forumdisplay.php?f=452 pour en savoir plus.
TEXT.German: Dawn of Civilization is still actively developed. You can get the latest bugfixes and additions by using the Git version of the mod. Visit the forum under http://forums.civfanatics.com/forumdisplay.php?f=452 to find out how.
TEXT.Italian: Dawn of Civilization is still actively developed. You can get the latest bugfixes and additions by using the Git version of the mod. Visit the forum under http://forums.civfanatics.com/forumdisplay.php?f=452 to find out how.
TEXT.Spanish: Dawn of Civilization is still actively developed. You can get the latest bugfixes and additions by using the Git version of the mod. Visit the forum under http://forums.civfanatics.com/forumdisplay.php?f=452 to find out how.

TEXT.English: Catholicism is founded by the Great Schism, which occurs when more than half of all Orthodox cities fall outside of the control of Orthodox civilisations.
TEXT.French: Le catholicisme est fondé au moment du Grand Schisme, qui se produit lorsque plus de la moitié des villes orthodoxes tombent hors du contrôle des civilisations orthodoxes.
TEXT.German: Catholicism is founded by the Great Schism, which occurs when more than half of all Orthodox cities fall outside of the control of Orthodox civilisations.
TEXT.Italian: Catholicism is founded by the Great Schism, which occurs when more than half of all Orthodox cities fall outside of the control of Orthodox civilisations.
TEXT.Spanish: Catholicism is founded by the Great Schism, which occurs when more than half of all Orthodox cities fall outside of the control of Orthodox civilisations.

TEXT.English: The amount of cultures that Great Artists can generate using Great Works depends on the game era.
TEXT.French: La quantité de culture engendrée lorsqu'un artiste illustre crée un chef d'œuvre dépend de l'ère actuelle.
TEXT.German: The amount of cultures that Great Artists can generate using Great Works depends on the game era.
TEXT.Italian: The amount of cultures that Great Artists can generate using Great Works depends on the game era.
TEXT.Spanish: The amount of cultures that Great Artists can generate using Great Works depends on the game era.

TEXT.English: Train a persecutor to remove non-state religions from your cities.
TEXT.French: Formez un inquisiteur si vous voulez retirer les religions non officielles de vos villes.
TEXT.German: Train a persecutor to remove non-state religions from your cities.
TEXT.Italian: Train a persecutor to remove non-state religions from your cities.
TEXT.Spanish: Train a persecutor to remove non-state religions from your cities.

TEXT.English: Confused about the expansion and civic stability rules? Look them up under the Concepts section in the Civilopedia!
TEXT.French: Confus quant aux règles qui régissent la stabilité liée à l'expansion et aux doctrines ? Consultez la section Concepts de la Civilopédia !
TEXT.German: Confused about the expansion and civic stability rules? Look them up under the Concepts section in the Civilopedia!
TEXT.Italian: Confused about the expansion and civic stability rules? Look them up under the Concepts section in the Civilopedia!
TEXT.Spanish: Confused about the expansion and civic stability rules? Look them up under the Concepts section in the Civilopedia!

TEXT.English: The soundtracks you hear during the Classical, Medieval and Renaissance eras depend on your state religion.
TEXT.French: La musique d'ambiance de l'ère classique, du Moyen Âge et de la Renaissance dépend de votre religion d'État.
TEXT.German: The soundtracks you hear during the Classical, Medieval and Renaissance eras depend on your state religion.
TEXT.Italian: The soundtracks you hear during the Classical, Medieval and Renaissance eras depend on your state religion.
TEXT.Spanish: The soundtracks you hear during the Classical, Medieval and Renaissance eras depend on your state religion.

TEXT.English: AI Romans and Greeks will receive armies to conquer the Mediterranean and Mesopotamia. Be prepared!
TEXT.French: Lorsqu'ils sont contrôlés par l'IA, les Romains et les Grecs reçoivent des armées pour conquérir la région méditerranéenne et la Mésopotamie. Soyez prêt !
TEXT.German: AI Romans and Greeks will receive armies to conquer the Mediterranean and Mesopotamia. Be prepared!
TEXT.Italian: AI Romans and Greeks will receive armies to conquer the Mediterranean and Mesopotamia. Be prepared!
TEXT.Spanish: AI Romans and Greeks will receive armies to conquer the Mediterranean and Mesopotamia. Be prepared!

TEXT.English: Cities on islands of size five or less also act as improvements for the resource they are founded on, yielding the full production and commerce increase for the city tile.
TEXT.French: Lorsqu'une ville se situe sur une case de ressource au sein d'une île de cinq cases ou moins, sa case rapporte autant que production et de commerce que si l'aménagement approprié y était construit.
TEXT.German: Cities on islands of size five or less also act as improvements for the resource they are founded on, yielding the full production and commerce increase for the city tile.
TEXT.Italian: Cities on islands of size five or less also act as improvements for the resource they are founded on, yielding the full production and commerce increase for the city tile.
TEXT.Spanish: Cities on islands of size five or less also act as improvements for the resource they are founded on, yielding the full production and commerce increase for the city tile.

TEXT.English: Defeating Native units on your territory while using Slavery has a chance to create a slave unit.
TEXT.French: Vaincre des unités indigènes sur votre territoire peut créer une unité d'esclave si vous avez adopté la doctrine de l'esclavage.
TEXT.German: Defeating Native units on your territory while using Slavery has a chance to create a slave unit.
TEXT.Italian: Defeating Native units on your territory while using Slavery has a chance to create a slave unit.
TEXT.Spanish: Defeating Native units on your territory while using Slavery has a chance to create a slave unit.

TEXT.English: Acquire slaves to build slave plantations or settle them in your cities. This option is only available in North America or in Africa unless your capital is in Africa.
TEXT.French: Obtenez des esclaves pour construire des plantations à esclaves ou pour les ajouter à vos villes. Cette option est possible uniquement en Amérique du Nord et en Afrique, sauf si votre capitale se situe en Afrique.
TEXT.German: Acquire slaves to build slave plantations or settle them in your cities. This option is only available in North America or in Africa unless your capital is in Africa.
TEXT.Italian: Acquire slaves to build slave plantations or settle them in your cities. This option is only available in North America or in Africa unless your capital is in Africa.
TEXT.Spanish: Acquire slaves to build slave plantations or settle them in your cities. This option is only available in North America or in Africa unless your capital is in Africa.

TEXT.English: If you run Slavery or Colonialism, you can trade slaves when interacting with other civilizations in the diplomacy interface.
TEXT.French: Si vous avez adopté l'esclavage ou le colonialisme, vous pouvez échanger des esclaves dans l'interface de diplomatie avec les autres civilisations.
TEXT.German: If you run Slavery or Colonialism, you can trade slaves when interacting with other civilizations in the diplomacy interface.
TEXT.Italian: If you run Slavery or Colonialism, you can trade slaves when interacting with other civilizations in the diplomacy interface.
TEXT.Spanish: If you run Slavery or Colonialism, you can trade slaves when interacting with other civilizations in the diplomacy interface.

TEXT.English: Tribal villages are placed randomly at the beginning of the game.
TEXT.French: Les villages tribaux sont placés aléatoirement au début du jeu.
TEXT.German: Tribal villages are placed randomly at the beginning of the game.
TEXT.Italian: Tribal villages are placed randomly at the beginning of the game.
TEXT.Spanish: Tribal villages are placed randomly at the beginning of the game.

TEXT.English: The area certain civilisations flip on spawn is not always identical to their core. Several civilizations can flip larger areas.
TEXT.French: Lorsqu'une nouvelle civilisation apparaît, la région qui lui revient automatiquement n'est pas forcément identique à son cœur historique. Plusieurs civilisations reçoivent des régions beaucoup plus étendues.
TEXT.German: The area certain civilisations flip on spawn is not always identical to their core. Several civilizations can flip larger areas.
TEXT.Italian: The area certain civilisations flip on spawn is not always identical to their core. Several civilizations can flip larger areas.
TEXT.Spanish: The area certain civilisations flip on spawn is not always identical to their core. Several civilizations can flip larger areas.

TEXT.English: The core of several civilisations expands on certain conditions, such as entering a new era.
TEXT.French: Le cœur historique de plusieurs civilisations prend de l'expansion lorsque certaines conditions sont réunies, par exemple l'entrée dans une nouvelle ère.
TEXT.German: The core of several civilisations expands on certain conditions, such as entering a new era.
TEXT.Italian: The core of several civilisations expands on certain conditions, such as entering a new era.
TEXT.Spanish: The core of several civilisations expands on certain conditions, such as entering a new era.

TEXT.English: The stability and flip zone maps for all civilizations can be found in the Maps folder.
TEXT.French: Des cartes montrant pour chaque civilisation les zones de stabilité et le territoire à la naissance peuvent être consultées dans le dossier Maps.
TEXT.German: The stability and flip zone maps for all civilizations can be found in the Maps folder.
TEXT.Italian: The stability and flip zone maps for all civilizations can be found in the Maps folder.
TEXT.Spanish: The stability and flip zone maps for all civilizations can be found in the Maps folder.

TEXT.English: The Tamil, Moorish, Tibetan, Polish and Congolese civilizations can be configured not to appear in every game. Edit the XML\GlobalDefinesAlt.xml file.
TEXT.French: Les civilisations tamoule, maure, tibétaine, polonaise et congolaise peuvent être configurées de telle sorte qu'elles n'apparaissent pas à chaque partie. Pour ce faire, il faut modifier le fichier XML\GlobalDefinesAlt.xml.
TEXT.German: The Tamil, Moorish, Tibetan, Polish and Congolese civilizations can be configured not to appear in every game. Edit the XML\GlobalDefinesAlt.xml file.
TEXT.Italian: The Tamil, Moorish, Tibetan, Polish and Congolese civilizations can be configured not to appear in every game. Edit the XML\GlobalDefinesAlt.xml file.
TEXT.Spanish: The Tamil, Moorish, Tibetan, Polish and Congolese civilizations can be configured not to appear in every game. Edit the XML\GlobalDefinesAlt.xml file.

TEXT.English: The Polynesian civilization is intended for the human player only. You can enable it for the AI in XML\GlobalDefinesAlt.xml, however its AI will not be geared towards playing successfully or realistically.
TEXT.French: The Polynesian civilization is intended for the human player only. You can enable it for the AI in XML\GlobalDefinesAlt.xml, however its AI will not be geared towards playing successfully or realistically.
TEXT.German: The Polynesian civilization is intended for the human player only. You can enable it for the AI in XML\GlobalDefinesAlt.xml, however its AI will not be geared towards playing successfully or realistically.
TEXT.Italian: The Polynesian civilization is intended for the human player only. You can enable it for the AI in XML\GlobalDefinesAlt.xml, however its AI will not be geared towards playing successfully or realistically.
TEXT.Spanish: The Polynesian civilization is intended for the human player only. You can enable it for the AI in XML\GlobalDefinesAlt.xml, however its AI will not be geared towards playing successfully or realistically.

TEXT.English: Watch your stability level closely. Depending on your situation, it can increase or decrease after significant game events. If your civilisation is collapsing and your stability does not improve until the next check, it will collapse!
TEXT.French: Attention à votre niveau de stabilité. Selon votre situation, il peut augmenter ou diminuer lors d'événements importants. Si votre civilisation est au bord de la chute et que votre stabilité ne s'améliore pas avant la prochaine vérification, vous vous effondrerez !
TEXT.German: Watch your stability level closely. Depending on your situation, it can increase or decrease after significant game events. If your civilisation is collapsing and your stability does not improve until the next check, it will collapse!
TEXT.Italian: Watch your stability level closely. Depending on your situation, it can increase or decrease after significant game events. If your civilisation is collapsing and your stability does not improve until the next check, it will collapse!
TEXT.Spanish: Watch your stability level closely. Depending on your situation, it can increase or decrease after significant game events. If your civilisation is collapsing and your stability does not improve until the next check, it will collapse!

TEXT.English: Stability checks are triggered by a variety of events including discovering techs, changing civics and losing or acquiring cities.
TEXT.French: Les vérifications de stabilité sont causées par divers événements, comme la découverte de technologies, les changements de doctrines et la perte ou l'acquisition de villes.
TEXT.German: Stability checks are triggered by a variety of events including discovering techs, changing civics and losing or acquiring cities.
TEXT.Italian: Stability checks are triggered by a variety of events including discovering techs, changing civics and losing or acquiring cities.
TEXT.Spanish: Stability checks are triggered by a variety of events including discovering techs, changing civics and losing or acquiring cities.

TEXT.English: Golden Ages protect you from most negative effects of being unstable. The protection only lasts as long as the Golden Age, however.
TEXT.French: Les âges d'or vous protègent de la plupart des effets négatifs de l'instabilité. Cependant, cette protection prend fin en même temps que l'âge d'or.
TEXT.German: Golden Ages protect you from most negative effects of being unstable. The protection only lasts as long as the Golden Age, however.
TEXT.Italian: Golden Ages protect you from most negative effects of being unstable. The protection only lasts as long as the Golden Age, however.
TEXT.Spanish: Golden Ages protect you from most negative effects of being unstable. The protection only lasts as long as the Golden Age, however.

TEXT.English: DoC adds a new terrain feature, Rainforests. They resemble Jungles, but cause no unhealthiness and can be improved after the discovery of Alloys.
TEXT.French: Dans Dawn of Civilization, une nouvelle caractéristique de terrain fait son apparition : les forêts tropicales. Elles sont similaires aux jungles, mais ne causent pas de maladie et peuvent être aménagées après la découverte des alliages.
TEXT.German: DoC adds a new terrain feature, Rainforests. They resemble Jungles, but cause no unhealthiness and can be improved after the discovery of Alloys.
TEXT.Italian: DoC adds a new terrain feature, Rainforests. They resemble Jungles, but cause no unhealthiness and can be improved after the discovery of Alloys.
TEXT.Spanish: DoC adds a new terrain feature, Rainforests. They resemble Jungles, but cause no unhealthiness and can be improved after the discovery of Alloys.

TEXT.English: In DoC, Ocean tiles start out yielding no food. Improvements on Ocean tiles require Compass, but in turn provide one additional food.
TEXT.French: Dans Dawn of Civilization, les cases d'océan ne rapportent pas de nourriture pour commencer. Les aménagements sur les cases d'océan nécessitent la découverte de la boussole, mais ils fournissent une nourriture additionnelle.
TEXT.German: In DoC, Ocean tiles start out yielding no food. Improvements on Ocean tiles require Compass, but in turn provide one additional food.
TEXT.Italian: In DoC, Ocean tiles start out yielding no food. Improvements on Ocean tiles require Compass, but in turn provide one additional food.
TEXT.Spanish: In DoC, Ocean tiles start out yielding no food. Improvements on Ocean tiles require Compass, but in turn provide one additional food.

TEXT.English: Islands are a new maritime terrain feature that provides additional production, tile defense and faster culture spread.
TEXT.French: Les îles sont une nouvelle caractéristique des terrains maritimes. Elles rapportent de la production, fournissent un bonus de défense et facilitent l'expansion culturelle.
TEXT.German: Islands are a new maritime terrain feature that provides additional production, tile defense and faster culture spread.
TEXT.Italian: Islands are a new maritime terrain feature that provides additional production, tile defense and faster culture spread.
TEXT.Spanish: Islands are a new maritime terrain feature that provides additional production, tile defense and faster culture spread.

TEXT.English: Instead of spreading their culture in rings with every new culture level, cities spread cultural control over individual tiles as their culture grows.
TEXT.French: Au lieu de prendre de l'expansion en cercles concentriques à chaque niveau culturel, les villes étendent leur contrôle sur des cases individuelles à mesure que croît leur culture.
TEXT.German: Instead of spreading their culture in rings with every new culture level, cities spread cultural control over individual tiles as their culture grows.
TEXT.Italian: Instead of spreading their culture in rings with every new culture level, cities spread cultural control over individual tiles as their culture grows.
TEXT.Spanish: Instead of spreading their culture in rings with every new culture level, cities spread cultural control over individual tiles as their culture grows.

TEXT.English: The amount of culture needed to cover a tile depends on its terrain type and features, as well as the distance to cities.
TEXT.French: La quantité de culture requise pour recouvrir une case dépend de son type de terrain et des caractéristiques du terrain, ainsi que de la distance entre la case et les villes.
TEXT.German: The amount of culture needed to cover a tile depends on its terrain type and features, as well as the distance to cities.
TEXT.Italian: The amount of culture needed to cover a tile depends on its terrain type and features, as well as the distance to cities.
TEXT.Spanish: The amount of culture needed to cover a tile depends on its terrain type and features, as well as the distance to cities.

TEXT.English: City culture will never expand beyond the third ring.
TEXT.French: La culture d'une ville ne s'étendra jamais au-delà du troisième cercle concentrique.
TEXT.German: City culture will never expand beyond the third ring.
TEXT.Italian: City culture will never expand beyond the third ring.
TEXT.Spanish: City culture will never expand beyond the third ring.

TEXT.English: The amount of culture required for the next tile to be covered is displayed as tick marks on the culture bar in the city screen.
TEXT.French: La quantité de culture requise pour recouvrir la prochaine case est montrée sous forme de graduations sur la barre de culture dans l'écran de la ville.
TEXT.German: The amount of culture required for the next tile to be covered is displayed as tick marks on the culture bar in the city screen.
TEXT.Italian: The amount of culture required for the next tile to be covered is displayed as tick marks on the culture bar in the city screen.
TEXT.Spanish: The amount of culture required for the next tile to be covered is displayed as tick marks on the culture bar in the city screen.

TEXT.English: A purple circle marks the next tile to be culturally covered in the city screen.
TEXT.French: Un cercle violet montre la prochaine case à être recouverte culturellement dans l'écran de la ville.
TEXT.German: A purple circle marks the next tile to be culturally covered in the city screen.
TEXT.Italian: A purple circle marks the next tile to be culturally covered in the city screen.
TEXT.Spanish: A purple circle marks the next tile to be culturally covered in the city screen.

TEXT.English: A Great Statesman can put an end to war or anarchy, improve diplomatic relations, build an Administrative Center or reform your civics for free.
TEXT.French: Un homme d'État illustre peut mettre fin à une guerre ou à l'anarchie, améliorer les relations diplomatiques, construire un centre administratif, ou réformer vos doctrines gratuitement.
TEXT.German: A Great Statesman can put an end to war or anarchy, improve diplomatic relations, build an Administrative Center or reform your civics for free.
TEXT.Italian: A Great Statesman can put an end to war or anarchy, improve diplomatic relations, build an Administrative Center or reform your civics for free.
TEXT.Spanish: A Great Statesman can put an end to war or anarchy, improve diplomatic relations, build an Administrative Center or reform your civics for free.

TEXT.English: Oases provide more food and less commerce. It is also possible to build Cottages on Oases.
TEXT.French: Les oasis rapportent plus de nourriture et moins de commerce. Il est aussi possible de construire des cottages sur les oasis.
TEXT.German: Oases provide more food and less commerce. It is also possible to build Cottages on Oases.
TEXT.Italian: Oases provide more food and less commerce. It is also possible to build Cottages on Oases.
TEXT.Spanish: Oases provide more food and less commerce. It is also possible to build Cottages on Oases.

TEXT.English: Spies can now accumulate experience and acquire promotions by successfully completing missions.
TEXT.French: Les espions peuvent désormais accumuler de l'expérience et obtenir des promotions lorsqu'ils réussissent des missions.
TEXT.German: Spies can now accumulate experience and acquire promotions by successfully completing missions.
TEXT.Italian: Spies can now accumulate experience and acquire promotions by successfully completing missions.
TEXT.Spanish: Spies can now accumulate experience and acquire promotions by successfully completing missions.

TEXT.English: Spy specialists have been removed. Instead, global spy experience is accumulated similar to military experience. If the bar is full, your most experienced spy becomes a Great Spy.
TEXT.French: Il n'y a plus de spécialistes espions. À la place, l'expérience de tous vous espions s'accumule globalement comme l'expérience des unités militaires. Quand la barre est pleine, votre espion le plus expérimenté devient un espion illustre.
TEXT.German: Spy specialists have been removed. Instead, global spy experience is accumulated similar to military experience. If the bar is full, your most experienced spy becomes a Great Spy.
TEXT.Italian: Spy specialists have been removed. Instead, global spy experience is accumulated similar to military experience. If the bar is full, your most experienced spy becomes a Great Spy.
TEXT.Spanish: Spy specialists have been removed. Instead, global spy experience is accumulated similar to military experience. If the bar is full, your most experienced spy becomes a Great Spy.

TEXT.English: If you have problems with game performance in the late game, enabling graphics paging in the BUG menu can help on some machines.
TEXT.French: Si vous éprouvez des problèmes avec la performance de jeu vers la fin de la partie, vous pouvez activer la pagination graphique dans le menu BUG. Cela peut améliorer la situation sur certains ordinateurs.
TEXT.German: If you have problems with game performance in the late game, enabling graphics paging in the BUG menu can help on some machines.
TEXT.Italian: If you have problems with game performance in the late game, enabling graphics paging in the BUG menu can help on some machines.
TEXT.Spanish: If you have problems with game performance in the late game, enabling graphics paging in the BUG menu can help on some machines.

TEXT.English: Civic combinations with positive or negative effects on stability are highlighted in the civics advisor.
TEXT.French: Les combinaisons de doctrines avec des effets positifs ou négatifs sur la stabilité sont mises en évidence dans l'écran du conseillers aux doctrines.
TEXT.German: Civic combinations with positive or negative effects on stability are highlighted in the civics advisor.
TEXT.Italian: Civic combinations with positive or negative effects on stability are highlighted in the civics advisor.
TEXT.Spanish: Civic combinations with positive or negative effects on stability are highlighted in the civics advisor.

TEXT.English: Religions spread gradually from around cities where the religion is already present. The presence of religious buildings increases the spread range.
TEXT.French: Une religion se propage graduellement à partir des villes où elle est déjà présente. L'existence de bâtiments religieux augmente la portée de la propagation.
TEXT.German: Religions spread gradually from around cities where the religion is already present. The presence of religious buildings increases the spread range.
TEXT.Italian: Religions spread gradually from around cities where the religion is already present. The presence of religious buildings increases the spread range.
TEXT.Spanish: Religions spread gradually from around cities where the religion is already present. The presence of religious buildings increases the spread range.

TEXT.English: Religions spread faster in regions where they were historically present. In some regions religions can only spread if they are the state religion of the owner.
TEXT.French: Une religion se propagera plus vite dans les régions où elle a une présence historique. Dans certaines régions, une religion donnée ne pourra se propager que si elle est la religion d'État du propriétaire des villes.
TEXT.German: Religions spread faster in regions where they were historically present. In some regions religions can only spread if they are the state religion of the owner.
TEXT.Italian: Religions spread faster in regions where they were historically present. In some regions religions can only spread if they are the state religion of the owner.
TEXT.Spanish: Religions spread faster in regions where they were historically present. In some regions religions can only spread if they are the state religion of the owner.

TEXT.English: There is a chance that an existing religion disappears when a new religion spreads to a city. Religions can also disappear when too many of them are present, especially in smaller cities.
TEXT.French: Lorsqu'une nouvelle religion se propage dans une ville, il est possible qu'une religion déjà présente disparaisse. Les religions peuvent également disparaître lorsque trop d'entre elles sont présentes, en particulier dans les petites villes.
TEXT.German: There is a chance that an existing religion disappears when a new religion spreads to a city. Religions can also disappear when too many of them are present, especially in smaller cities.
TEXT.Italian: There is a chance that an existing religion disappears when a new religion spreads to a city. Religions can also disappear when too many of them are present, especially in smaller cities.
TEXT.Spanish: There is a chance that an existing religion disappears when a new religion spreads to a city. Religions can also disappear when too many of them are present, especially in smaller cities.

TEXT.English: Only proselytizing religions, that is Buddhism, Christianity and Islam, can be spread by missionaries in civilizations with a different state religion.
TEXT.French: Seules les religions possédant une tradition de prosélytisme, soit le bouddhisme, le christianisme et l'islam, peuvent être propagées par des missionnaires dans les civilisations ayant adopté une religion d'État différente.
TEXT.German: Only proselytizing religions, that is Buddhism, Christianity and Islam, can be spread by missionaries in civilizations with a different state religion.
TEXT.Italian: Only proselytizing religions, that is Buddhism, Christianity and Islam, can be spread by missionaries in civilizations with a different state religion.
TEXT.Spanish: Only proselytizing religions, that is Buddhism, Christianity and Islam, can be spread by missionaries in civilizations with a different state religion.
